1.0.name: wordpress/gigatoolscron
1.0.description:
GigatoolsCron plugin is able to list your events created on gigatools.com, pull these events and present on your own blog in a separate page.

You can create the events yearly archive widget in the blog site sidebar. Also, the plugin can be used independently of gigatools. You can create/edit, any upcoming or past events, and present them on on your site.

The plugin comes with an archiving facility. Every event pulled from gigatools will be archived. Also you will be able to create your own past events archive not related to gigatools, and present on your site.
